item.title: LF Mentorship Session
item.description: Notes from LF Live Mentorship Session: Best Practices for Getting Your Patches Accepted During this mentorship session, several key takeaways and resources were shared for those interested in contributing to the Linux kernel. Below are some important notes and helpful links to get started. Key Tips for Getting Started: Watch Mailing Lists It’s crucial to start by observing mailing lists related to your areas of interest. This allows you to understand the discussions and ongoing work within the community.
